ad_text: Coin LLC Sponsored PAY & BENEFITS ▪ Paid time off ▪ Direct Deposit ▪ Performance bonuses ▪ Salary will be determined by your experience and discussed during your interview, but we project a salary range up to $90,000 per year ABOUT Fleet dispatchers track and manage drivers. They assign drivers routes, destinations, and timelines, as well as keep in touch with drivers who are on the road. Dispatchers interact with clients and drivers to keep up-to-date information on routes and schedules. Because a dispatcher interacts with the client to address any concerns or route changes, some customer service experience is helpful. Dispatchers usually work out of a company office managing digital/physical route and driver files and answer calls from the fleet and customers. RESPONSIBILITIES ▪ Multitasking ▪ Conduct yourself in a very professional and highly organized manner ▪ Pre book over the road operations ▪ Frontline interaction with customers via phone and email ▪ Book and enter loads into TMS for operations to plan and dispatch ▪ Problem solve with customer when loads and/or drivers have issues ▪ Continual updates on load details and ETA’s ▪ Update customers on delays, equipment issues and paperwork ▪ Be professionally demanding of all stakeholders and always offer solutions instead of excuses ▪ Dispatch/Coordinate & assign loads and load information with drivers ▪ Enter and update load information in TMS ▪ Accessorial tracking and alerts for both customer and driver QUALIFICATIONS & REQUIREMENTS​ ▪ You must be able to multi task, have good customer service and be able to deal with some frustration with impatient customers. WITH A GOOD ATTITUDE ▪ 2 years minimum experience in Dry Van, Reefer – OTR required ▪ Have a solid understanding of the trucking industry ▪ Knowledge on how to use DAT and TruckStop 📱 Call & Text: +1 (509) 822-6795 📧 Email: hr@tdrtruck.com 🖥 Apply Online: https://tdrlogisticsllc.com/career-job/office-staff/accounting-clerk/ FB.ME Job - Fleet Dispatch - Spokane, WA up to $90,000 per year Learn more

Coin LLC Sponsored Qualified candidate will be responsible for various bookkeeping and accounting processing which may include; Cash handling. Review department reports. Complete journal entries. Processing of vendor invoices. A candidate must have some knowledge and experience on computerized accounting systems. RESPONSIBILITIES ▪ Record daily cash transactions into QuickBooks ▪ Record bills into QuickBooks for accounts payable approval ▪ Issue and process checks for mailing ▪ Maintain controls around debit/credit cards & petty cash ▪ Assist in general month end accounting tasks ▪ Maintain daily reports with bank account updates ▪ Other tasks as requested QUALIFICATIONS & REQUIREMENTS​ ▪ Russian speaking ▪ 2-years of accounting experience or some experience ▪ General accounting principal knowledge ▪ Quickbooks experience ▪ Knowledge of Microsoft office products ▪ Must have attention to detail ▪ Must be self-motivated & a critical thinker ▪ Good communication and customer service skills 📱 Call & Text: +1 (509) 822-6795 📧 Email: hr@tdrtruck.com 🖥 Apply Online: https://tdrlogisticsllc.com/career-job/office-staff/accounting-clerk/ FB.ME Job - Accounting Clerk - Spokane, WA PAY: $25 - $30 /HOUR Learn more

Coin LLC Sponsored TDR Logistics ищет Бухгалтера на должность Accounts Receivable. Квалифицированный кандидат будет отвечать за различную бухгалтерскую обработку. ОБЯЗАННОСТИ ▪ Обработка первичной документации ▪ Занесение документов в Quickbooks ▪ Контроль за своевременной оплатой ▪ Работа с клиентами (включая телефонные звонки, имейл, и.т.д) ▪ Оказание помощи в решении общих задач ( в конце месяца, квартала, года) ▪ Предоставление отчетов руководству ▪ Знание двух языков (английский, русский) КВАЛИФИКАЦИЯ И ТРЕБОВАНИЯ ▪ Знание Quickbooks ▪ Microsoft office ▪ Внимание к деталям ▪ Хорошие навыки общения и обслуживания клиентов Свяжитесь с нами: 📱 Call & Text: +1 (509) 822-6795 📧 Email: hr@tdrtruck.com 🖥 Apply Online: https://tdrlogisticsllc.com/career-job/office-staff/accounting-clerk/ FB.ME Вакансия Бухгалтера - Spokane, WA ОПЛАТА: $25 - $30 /ЧАС Learn more
